name: CS340_Final_Project
description: Dynamic content with Express and Handlebars

scripts.build: handlebars views/partials/book-info-row.handlebars -f public/js/book-info-row-template.js && handlebars views/partials/store-info-row.handlebars -f public/js/store-info-row-template.js && handlebars views/partials/vend-info-row.handlebars -f public/js/vend-info-row-template.js && handlebars views/partials/purchase-info-row.handlebars -f public/js/purchase-info-row-template.js && handlebars views/partials/purchase-info-footer.handlebars -f public/js/purchase-info-footer-template.js

author: Luan Songjian
